title: [K-12] Workshop on Instructional Design Through Genre Analysis in Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: High School-Level Mathematics Foundations and General Understanding of the Education Sector
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment construction using digital devices, with case analyses based on interviews with field teachers.

learning_goals: Mathematics teaching materials in educational settings can be systematically classified according to a genre analysis framework (4 movement phases, 14-step procedure).
Using the analyzed genre model, specific instructional design plans for mathematics pedagogy tailored to learner levels can be developed.
Propose three or more flexible instructional strategies applicable to diverse educational environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
